---
title: "cache_memory_items.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines settings for a memory cache. It specifies whether the memory cache is enabled and sets the maximum number of items that can be stored in the cache.

## Symbols

### `cache`
#### Description
The root configuration object for caching-related settings.

### `cache.memory`
#### Description
Configuration settings specific to the memory cache.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Determines whether the memory cache is enabled or disabled |
| items | integer | Specifies the maximum number of items that can be stored in the memory cache |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| cache.memory.enabled | boolean | false | Determines if the memory cache is enabled |
| cache.memory.items | integer | 500 | Sets the maximum number of items in the memory cache |

This configuration file is likely used to control the behavior of a memory caching system within a larger application. The memory cache is currently disabled (`enabled: false`), and if enabled, it would have a capacity of 500 items.
